instruction: What spectral feature processing methods were used for real-time monitoring of crop growth by estimating crop nitrogen content?

instruction: What metric was chosen to evaluate the accuracy for real-time monitoring of crop growth by estimating crop nitrogen content, and how far can this metric go in terms of accuracy?

instruction: What machine learning algorithms were used in the related study to estimate nitrogen content at different leaf positions based on hyperspectrum data and spectral features?

instruction: Can the use of wavelet coefficients in remote sensing estimation of crop nitrogen content be considered a superior method compared to traditional methods?
